attributes.action: Longer prison sentences for single punch manslaughter
attributes.additional_details:
4/5 years is no prison sentence for taking someone's life n any situation even though most single punch manslaughter cases are ending this way
Longer sentences for thugs that deliberately cause fights on the streets resulting in many pointless deaths and heart break for innocent family's
4/5 years is clearly not enough as we read about this happening over and over again in the newspapers
